feed.title: Big Trout Lake - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Big Trout Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light overnight. Wind becoming north 20 before morning. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h near midnight. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 34 in the evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023
